title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 313 - Administrative Determination Processing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 313 - Administrative Determination Processing

State Regulations
§ 313.1 - Statement of purpose
§ 313.2 - Issues subject to administrative determination processing
§ 313.3 - Procedure for administrative determination processing
§ 313.4 to 313.5 - Repealed
§ 313.6 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. A, pt. 313

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 20[1], 25[2-b]; Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Law, § 49; Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law, §
49

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
